Html:
Hi,

Can I use NetOffice - MS Office to show, edit and save a spreedshet in browser like Google Drive? Where can I find a example or a howto?

absolutly not. this is not what netoffice is about. its designed to create plugins/addons in an easy way. You may want have a look to the ClosedXML project here on codeplex. may this is more what you need.

https://closedxml.codeplex.com

*Sebastian
